reviews.text: cereal, caramel, coffee, roasty, earthy, woody, smoke, Personally I love a dark beer thatâs got that old world feel on the palate. Itâs a bit harsher than my personal favorite Guinness Draught, but itâs also crisper. Sorta like drinking a cola.

caramel, roasty, resin, leather, alcohol, woody, Very strong, almost astringent in taste. Yet not overpowering. Similar to drinking a boilermaker in feel. Could do to sell in larger portions as the serving is quite small.
